metadata.title: CVE-2024-55635 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Drupal Core allows Cross-SiteScripting (XSS).This issue affects Drupal Core: from 7.0 before 7.102.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
